title: APT / STEBAN barks
description: Steban's barks in the underground reading room

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That girl from my seminar *promise..."
dialogueTree.text: "That girl from my seminar *promised* she would stop by."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Theory is the poetry of thought.""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Maurice and Zuzanna will be back,..."
dialogueTree.text: "Maurice and Zuzanna will be back, I know it."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Who the hell took my jacket?""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Kind of chilly tonight, Uli.""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""Puncher and Wattmann should be req..."
dialogueTree.text: "Puncher and Wattmann should be required reading."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""The only 'class' I care about is t..."
dialogueTree.text: "The only 'class' I care about is the working class."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""If infra-materialism is wrong, I d..."
dialogueTree.text: "If infra-materialism is wrong, I don't want to be right."

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""My grades are trash this semester.""
Steban, the Student Communist: ""We're the only real communists lef..."
Steban, the Student Communist: ""An interesting point, Uli.""
